itemLabel: Robert Alexander, Baron Alexander of Weedon
itemDescription: Baron Alexander of Weedon, Banker, barrister, politician, Chancellor of the University of Exeter (1936-2005)

wikipedia_page.main: Robert Scott Alexander, Baron Alexander of Weedon, QC, FRSA (5 September 1936— 6 November 2005) was a British barrister, banker and Conservative politician.

response: In Law, alumni include the barrister and vice-chancellor Robert Alexander, Baron Alexander of Weedon, the former President of the British Supreme Court Nicholas Phillips, Baron Phillips of Worth Matravers; and the Judge of the General Court of the Court of Justice of the European Union Geert de Baere.
* Robert Alexander, Baron Alexander of Weedon (1936–2005)
